short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows top people by mentions in a given subreddit

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension uses natural language processing to graph people discussed in the last week.

This version works for a selected group of 10 subreddits, but we can add others which are requested!
